string-array.name: starting_quotes
string-array.item: Prejudice is a burden that confuses the past, threatens the future and renders the present inaccessible. \n- Maya Angelou
The pessimist sees difficulty in every opportunity. The optimist sees the opportunity in every difficulty. \n- Winston Churchill
The most precious gift we can offer anyone is our attention. When mindfulness embraces those we love, they will bloom like flowers. \n- Thich Nhat Hanh
Patience is a virtue but you will never ever accomplish anything if you don\'t exercise action over patience. \n- Byron Pulsifer
I don\'t believe in failure. It\'s not failure if you enjoyed the process. \n- Oprah Winfrey
